Controllers

Class AddCommentRecordController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.AddCommentRecordController

  • public class AddCommentRecordController
extends java.lang.Object
    AddCommentRecordController Creates a new Record that holds the provider's comment and adds it into a selected problem's list of records.
    Since:
    2018-11-27

    • Method Detail

      • createRecord

        public Record createRecord(java.lang.String providerID,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           java.util.Date date,
                           java.lang.String comment,
                           java.lang.String problemUUID)
                    throws UserIDMustBeAtLeastEightCharactersException,
                           TitleTooLongException,
                           CommentTooLongException
        Given an ID, title, comment, date, patient's ID and problem UUID a comment record is made and the record is returned
        Parameters:
        providerID - - Provider ID
        title - - title of comment
        date - - date created
        comment - - comment written by provider
        problemUUID - - selected problem UUID
        Returns:
        - a comment record created by the provider
        Throws:
        UserIDMustBeAtLeastEightCharactersException - - ID must be >=8
        TitleTooLongException - - title too long
        CommentTooLongException - - comment too long

      • addRecord

        public void addRecord(Record record)
               throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        addRecord Given a record add it to the list of records of a given problem. The problem is fetched through the given problemUUID
        Parameters:
        record - - record to be added
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - -
        java.lang.InterruptedException - -
